parameters.name: CronBeginDate
parameters.description: The start of the time range for scheduling.

parameters.name: CronEndDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range for scheduling.

parameters.name: CronStr
parameters.description: The cron expression for timed scheduling.

parameters.name: CronType
parameters.description:
The type of the scheduling cycle. Valid values:

*   **MINUTE**: scheduling by minute
*   **HOUR**: scheduling by hour
*   **DAY**: scheduling by day
*   **WEEK**: scheduling by week
*   **MONTH**: scheduling by month

parameters.name: DagId
parameters.description: The ID of the task flow.

parameters.name: ScheduleParam
parameters.description: The event scheduling configuration. The value of this parameter is a JSON string.

parameters.name: ScheduleSwitch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable scheduling. Valid values:

*   **Enable**
*   **Disable**

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> : To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~).

parameters.name: TimeZoneId
parameters.description: The time zone. The default time zone is UTC+8 (Asia/Shanghai).

parameters.name: TriggerType
parameters.description:
The mode in which the task flow is triggered. Valid values:

*   **Cron**: The task flow is triggered based on timed scheduling.
*   **Event**: The task flow is triggered by events.
